HvaSkjerNårForside.Title: What happens when?
HvaSkjerNårForside.Innhold: This guide is for those who want to learn more about what happens from applying for parental benefits to the money being fully paid out.
HvaSkjerNår.SituasjonSide.KunFarEllerMed: Only the father/co-mother will receive a payment
HvaSkjerNår.SituasjonSide.KunMor: Only the mother will receive a payment
HvaSkjerNår.SituasjonSide.HvisBarnetErFø: If you had a child before October 1, 2021, you must take your parental leave period consecutively. You must start taking your weeks at the latest when {hvem}'s parental benefit period is over, or apply for a deferral, in order not to lose days of parental benefits.
HvaSkjerNår.OppsummeringSide.Svar: What did {erAleneforsørger, select, true {I} other {we}} answer?
valideringsfeil.termindato.forLangtFremI: The due date cannot be later than 6 months after the date of birth
valideringsfeil.termindato.forLangtTilba: The due date cannot be earlier than one month before the birth date
valideringsfeil.termindato.ugyldigDatoFo: The due date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
valideringsfeil.termindato.forTidlig: The due date cannot be earlier than 3 weeks from today
valideringsfeil.fødselsdato.måVæreIdagEl: The date of birth must be today or earlier
valideringsfeil.fødselsdato.ugyldigDatoF: The date of birth must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
valideringsfeil.fødselsdato.førOktober20: Date of birth is before October 1, 2021
